descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Goldbrand Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]: Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures, adaptation, screenshots
[color=#ffff00]Version[/color]: 1.1[color=#ffff00]
Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds Goldbrand and Eltonbrand swords from early TES games. It can be obtained under the College of Winterhold bridge.

[color=#ffff00]Changes[/color] in version 1.1:
- Added Eltonbrand
- Textures improvement

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

***
